gold.user: As a marketing manager, I want to retrieve all campaigns for my organization to analyze their performance and plan future strategies.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of campaigns associated with the specified organization.

gold.user: As a marketing manager, I want to create a new campaign for my organization to promote our latest product launch.
gold.ideal: Creates a new campaign and returns the details of the created campaign.

gold.user: As a marketing analyst, I want to get the summary of a specific campaign to evaluate its effectiveness.
gold.ideal: Returns the summary details of the specified campaign.

gold.user: As a marketing manager, I want to update the details of an existing campaign to reflect new changes in our strategy.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified campaign and returns the updated campaign details.

gold.user: As a marketing manager, I want to delete an outdated campaign that is no longer relevant to our current marketing efforts.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified campaign and confirms the deletion.
